channel.title: Skillcapes hoods/Hats Error with (mouth)
channel.description:
Ohk well I have working beards but when a put on a void knight mage hat or any skillcape hood i get this
[u][b]Picture with error[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j270/n2lil/Eoor.png[/img]
now is this fixable with a code? if so could you help meh?
~Much appreciated, Fallenscape Owner

item.title: Skillcapes hoods/Hats Error with (mouth)
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

2 ways that can happen:

  1. a glitch or error which cant be detected by your compiler(in client)
  2. a graphics issue or glitch or your server cant hold the grahpics so it leaks a little. i think i saw a tut on this at:

www.dodian.com

in the forums section… i odnt have a direct link, sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes hoods/Hats Error with (mouth)
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:10, topic:144661”]if you send breads before something or after something to client I forgot the order of sending apperance has to be exactly the same or it will do unexcepted results such as a hole in mouth Here is my order

[code]
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerCape] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerCape]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerAmulet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerAmulet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerWeapon] > 1 && !IsWcing) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerWeapon]);
} else if (playerAxe > 0 && IsWcing) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerAxe);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerShield] > 1 && !IsWcing) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerShield]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (!Item.isPlate(playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerLegs] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerLegs]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs);
}
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerHands] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerHands]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerFeet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerFeet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);
}
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}

  //playerProps.writeByte(0);

[/code][/quote]

so i should move some stuff around?

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes hoods/Hats Error with (mouth)
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

if you send breads before something or after something to client I forgot the order of sending apperance has to be exactly the same or it will do unexcepted results such as a hole in mouth Here is my order

      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat] > 1) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerCape] > 1) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerCape]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerAmulet] > 1) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerAmulet]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerWeapon] > 1 && !IsWcing) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerWeapon]);
      } else if (playerAxe > 0 && IsWcing) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerAxe);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest] > 1) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerShield] > 1 && !IsWcing) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerShield]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      if (!Item.isPlate(playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest])) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerLegs] > 1) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerLegs]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs);
      }
      if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat])) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead);		// head
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerHands] > 1) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerHands]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands);
      }
      if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerFeet] > 1) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerFeet]);
      } else {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);
      }
      if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {
        playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
      } else {
        playerProps.writeByte(0);
      }
      
      //playerProps.writeByte(0);

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes hoods/Hats Error with (mouth)
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

[quote=“Khasck, post:6, topic:144661”]Khasck ProCoding is writing code to fix beards on hoods as you speak

the problem is, you added it to your fullhelm in item.java.
but if its not there, then hair sticks out through the hood.
i will be finished with this code soon, after afew more testing, please be patient, and look for it in the tut’s section in the next couple days.

-Liam[/quote]

Great I’ll look forward to it by the way dose anyone know a good fire makiing tut?

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes hoods/Hats Error with (mouth)
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

Khasck ProCoding is writing code to fix beards on hoods as you speak

the problem is, you added it to your fullhelm in item.java.
but if its not there, then hair sticks out through the hood.
i will be finished with this code soon, after afew more testing, please be patient, and look for it in the tut’s section in the next couple days.

-Liam

Read full topic
